code_handling.comment: Groq for fast code analysis with expertise in programming

deep_scraping.comment: Local CodeLlama for detailed extraction (requires: ollama pull codellama)

scraper_decision.comment: Smart routing decisions for scraping strategy

reasoning_and_interaction.comment: Groq Llama for reliable multi-agent orchestration (Perplexity has API compatibility issues with CrewAI)

external_search.comment: Perplexity Sonar ONLY for external search (via ExternalSearchAgent)

retrieval_agents.comment: Discussion/notebook/data summarization - high quality and accurate
